headline: Time To Take Profit In Costco Stock? Rivals BJ And Kroger Soar.
summary: The mixed Costco earnings report followed better-than-feared earnings from BJ's Wholesale Club and Kroger.

headline: Kroger (NYSE:KR) Reports Full Year Earnings Growth But Q4 Sales Fall By 7%
summary: Kroger (NYSE:KR) recently announced its earnings and corporate guidance for 2025, projecting a modest sales growth of 2 to 3% without fuel. Despite a 1% decline in fourth-quarter sales, the company reported a full-year net income increase from the previous year and higher earnings per share. This performance contributed to a 7.68% increase in its stock price over the last quarter, alongside executive leadership changes including the resignation of Chairman Rodney McMullen. In contrast,...
